titles.title: Glory and praise to you, O Christ.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory and praise to you, O Christ.
Glory and praise to you, O Christ

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Man shall not live by bread alone,
But be every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Glory and praise to you, O Christ
